testcase.classname: Submit data to webdriver university using contact us form
testcase.name: Check Page Objects
testcase.system-out: Given I access Contact Form.................................................passed When I enter a valid First Name.............................................passed And I enter a valid Last Name...............................................passed And I enter a valid email address...........................................passed And I enter comments........................................................passed When I click on the submit button...........................................passed Then the information should successfully be submitted via the contact us form.passed

testcase.name: Validate promo code alert is visible when clicking on the special offers link
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "http://webdriveruniversity.com/Page-Object-Model/products.html" website.passed When User clicks on the "#container-special-offers".........................passed Then User should be presented with a promo alert............................passed
